



## Gmail-Validation


```js
var gv =  require('gmail-validation');

gv.Gmail('Insert Email');

```
```js
if(gv.GmailValidationError() === true){
  //Gmail true
}else {
  //Gmail false
}
```

## Installation

```bash
$ npm install gmail-validation --save
```

  Install dependencies:

```bash
$ npm install
```

  Start the server:

```bash
$ npm start
```
